projects.title: Esports Gaming Website (ESGN)
projects.bodyText:
- Collaborated on a team of 5 to build a responsive multiplatform esports web-app.
 - Utilizes APIs to give real-time updates on games and headlines as well as live game footage.
 - Full-Stack web application will be hosted and deployed on AWS.

projects.title: Real-time Water Sensor App (Hack West Texas Hackathon)
projects.bodyText:
- Developed a dynamic web application that leveraged AWS IoT to provide real-time water sensor data based on user-provided zip codes
 - Deployed the application using AWS Elastic Beanstalk, ensuring scalability and reliability

projects.title: Automatic Spending Spreadsheet Web App
projects.bodyText:
- Designed and implemented an innovative web application that streamlines expense tracking
 - Integrated SMS with Twilio and receipt image parsing to automatically populate item details and prices into a userâ€™s personal spending spreadsheet

projects.title: Local Movie Theater Web App
projects.bodyText:
- Created a feature-rich web application using Node.js, React, and MongoDB for a local movie theater platform
 - Enabled users to browse movies and theaters, create accounts, and purchase tickets seamlessly
 - Utilized full-stack development skills to deliver a user-friendly experience
